comment: Prophetic Word during the Watch Night Service at Ariel Assembly Our year of Quantum Leap for Joy This is your year of multiple and continuous joy and victories , you shall leap for joy . You will make giant strides in your endeavors Death and sickness shall be far from you <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Prophetic Word during the Watch Night Service at Ariel Assembly Our year of Quantum Leap for Joy This is your year of multiple and continuous joy and victories , you shall leap for joy . You will make giant strides in your endeavors Death and sickness shall be far from you <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / word
            :mod (g / genuine)
            :time (e / event
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Watch"
                        :op2 "Night"
                        :op3 "Service")
                  :location (o / organization
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Ariel"
                              :op2 "Assembly"))))
      :snt2 (y / year
            :poss (y2 / you)
            :time-of (l / leap-03
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :purpose (j / joy))
            :time-of (y3 / year
                  :poss y2
                  :time-of (a / and
                        :op1 (j2 / joy
                              :quant (m2 / multiple)
                              :ARG1-of (c / continue-01))
                        :op2 (w2 / win-01
                              :quant m2))))
      :snt3 (s / stride-01
            :ARG0 (y4 / you)
            :ARG1 (e2 / endeavor-01
                  :ARG0 y4)
            :mod (g2 / giant))
      :snt4 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d / die-01)
                  :op2 (s2 / sick-05))
            :ARG2 (f / far
                  :location-of e2
                  :ARG0 y4)))

comment: It is a year to remain in God's presence Be a giver not just a receiver , sow , tithe , help , support , spend and be spent This year do not trivialize the anointing or the anointed Be expectant throughout this year , have faith and have hope , love the Lord and love people
amr:

      :snt4 (a2 / and

amr:
